description:
I'd say red hot but, well, you get it. Anyway, she was amazing! So sexy, very, very tough and fun to work with too. First we throw a key in the big tank. Then we throw her in the tank in her latex outfit, shackled and chained. Then a tough bent over tie with some impact and DOS play. Third is a very hard kneeling tie, rubberbands on her very nice natural breats, tight crotchrope and lots of abuse. For scene four I put a twist on the plastic bag scenario which turned out very hot.
Check it out and let me know if you like this girl as much as I do. Thanks Cherry!
title: Cherry Torn is Pink hot!
